title: Ангелы района
overview: The Shatalov family plays an important role in the life of their area. The head of the family, Alena, runs a management company that serves the entire neighborhood. Her husband Mikhail is a doctor at a district clinic, and their twenty-year-old son Artem serves as a district police officer. Every day this magnificent family solves the everyday problems of the residents of their area, constantly finding themselves in funny and curious situations. But one day the Shatalovs' personal problems grow to the scale of a domestic disaster. Will they be able to maintain peace in the family and maintain order in the area?
